original: Only one tribe can live in each county.
translation: 每个省份只能存留一个部落。

original: Valid Casus Belli
translation: 有效宣战理由

original: Sami
translation: 萨米

original: Sami Band
translation: 萨米大队

original: Sami
translation: 萨米大队

original: The game data files have been altered in some way, disabling achievements in Ironman mode. Check so you don't have a mod loaded or verify your game files. Using the Ruler Designer will also disable achievments.
translation: 游戏的数据文件已经被修改，铁人模式因而禁用。请检查是否加载有Mod或检验你的游戏文件。使用角色设计器也将禁用你的成就。

original: All of the following must NOT be true
translation: 必须不满足以下所有条件

original: Denied
translation: 拒绝

original: Extend
translation: 拓展

original: Build $TYPE$
translation: 建造$TYPE$

original: Are you sure you want to build a $TYPE$?\nIt will cost you §Y$COST$§!¤ and will be finished on §Y$FINISHED$§!
translation: 你确定要建造一座$TYPE$吗？\n这将消耗你 §Y$COST$§!¤ 并在 $FINISHED$ 完工

original: §Y$GOVERNMENT$§! Government allows building §Y$TYPE$§!
translation: §Y$GOVERNMENT$§!政体允许建造§Y$TYPE$§!

original: Controls §Y$PROVINCE$§!
translation: 控制§Y$PROVINCE$§!

original: $TYPE$ under construction by §Y$BUILDER$§!\nWill be finished on §Y$DATE$§!
translation: §Y$BUILDER$§!\n建造的$TYPE$将于§Y$DATE$§!完工

original: §YBuild a new $TYPE$§!
translation: §Y建造一座新的$TYPE$§!

original: No $TYPE$ Built
translation: 没有已建造的$TYPE$

original: $TYPE$ Under Construction
translation: $TYPE$在建造中

original: Creates a $TYPE$ in $LOCATION$
translation: 在$LOCATION$建造一座$TYPE$

original: Nomad Tax
translation: 游牧税

original: From Forts: §G$AMOUNT$§!\n
translation: 来自堡垒：§G$AMOUNT$§!\n

original: The $TYPE$ in $LOCATION$ is destroyed
translation: 在$LOCATION$的$TYPE$被摧毁

original: §Y$TAKER$§! seizes the §Y$PROV$§! $TYPE$
translation: §Y$TAKER$§!夺取了§Y$PROV$§!$TYPE$

original: Any Fort
translation: 任何堡垒

original: Difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§!'s Forts lower than §Y$VAL$§!
translation: §Y$FIRST$§!与§Y$SECOND$§!的堡垒之差异小于§Y$VAL$§!

original: Difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§!'s Forts at least §Y$VAL$§!
translation: §Y$FIRST$§!与§Y$SECOND$§!的堡垒之差异至少§Y$VAL$§!

original: Has fewer than §Y$NUM$§! Forts
translation: 少于§Y$NUM$§!座堡垒

original: Has at least §Y$NUM$§! Forts
translation: 至少有§Y$NUM$§!座堡垒

original: Has $TYPE$
translation: 有$TYPE$

original: Does NOT have $TYPE$
translation: 没有$TYPE$

original: Fort Owner
translation: 堡垒所有者

original: Fort of $PROV$
translation: $PROV$的堡垒

original: Strengthened Loyalty
translation: 忠诚增进

original: Proud Parent
translation: 自豪的父母

original: Wolf Child
translation: 狼之子

original: There is something strange about this child...
translation: 这个小孩有些怪……

original: Wolf's Blood
translation: 狼人之血

original: This character is rumored to have the blood of wolves running through [GetHerHis] veins.
translation: 据传这个角色的血管里流淌着狼的血液。

original: Not Sleeping Well
translation: 没睡好

original: This character isn't getting much sleep lately.
translation: 这个角色最近没睡好觉。

original: The Wolf Child
translation: 狼之子

original: Little [From.GetFirstName] has been growing quickly. [From.GetSheHeCap] is alert and quick to learn, strong and healthy. [From.GetHerHisCap] voice is a little unusual, however, often descending to deep but playful growl. [From.GetSheHeCap] often sniffs around in an odd manner while looking for [From.GetHerHis] toys, and yes, [From.GetSheHe] is unusually hairy.\n\n[From.GetSheHeCap] has also several times bit [From.GetHerHis] nanny. But apart from that, everything is normal.
translation: 小小的[From.GetFirstName]成长的十分迅速。[From.GetSheHeCap]思维敏捷学习迅速，强壮并健康。然而，[From.GetHerHisCap]声音有点不寻常，常常深沉但又顽皮的咆哮。[From.GetSheHeCap]经常以一种四处嗅着的奇怪方式去寻找[From.GetHerHis]玩具，而且[From.GetSheHe]确实异常地毛茸茸。\n\n[From.GetSheHeCap]也有几次咬[From.GetHerHis]保姆。但除此之外，一切正常。

original: A fine little [From.GetBoyGirl]!
translation: 一只小的[From.GetBoyGirl]！

original: This is strange and worrying...
translation: 这令人及奇怪又担心……

original: You are out inspecting your lands, accompanied by your best soldiers. As you pass through a shallow gorge lined by low, windswept trees, you are suddenly alerted to an unusual sound. You order the column to halt and cock your head to listen. Yes, you hear it now, a thin wailing sound, as if from a puppy dog…\nYou spur your horse forward to try and locate the source of the sound, and soon you come upon a small cave. As you enter, bringing a light into the gloom within, you see a strange sight. A dead female wolf lies near the cave entrance, traces of disease plainly visible on her carcass. A small human child lies on a bed of grass and leaves near the wolf, wailing in a strange tone that seems almost animal-like to you in this strange place...
translation: 你外出巡视你的土地，最精良的士兵伴随左右。你经过一条浅浅的峡谷，路旁长着低矮且被风吹弯的树木，你突然注意到不寻常的声响。你命令队伍停下，侧耳倾听。确实有声音，你现在听清楚了，一个微弱的哭嚎声，如同是由刚出生的小狗发出来的……\n你策马前行尝试定位声音的源头，很快你就遇到一个小小的洞穴。你进入洞穴，用火光驱散了里面的阴暗，你看到奇怪的景象。死去的母狼躺在洞穴入口不远处，疾病的迹象在尸体上清晰可见。幼小的人类婴儿躺在稻草床上，被遗弃在母狼身边，用奇特的声调哭嚎，在你听来几乎像是动物在嚎叫，特别是在这个奇怪的地方……

original: I shall take this child in as my own [New.GetSonDaughter].
translation: 我将像对待我自己的[New.GetSonDaughter]一样照顾他。

original: I will have nothing to do with this!
translation: 我与这不相干！

original: One day, playing outside by yourself, you notice suddenly that there is no one watching you, all the adults are busy. This being a perfect moment to go exploring undisturbed, you quickly sneak away and head for the wilds, where you aren’t normally allowed to go alone…\nA few hours later, you are lost. Hopelessly lost. As you sit down on a rock and begin to cry, you hear a strange sound behind you. As you turn around, you see a large gray wolf looking at you. She doesn’t seem threatening at all. After a few moments, you understand that she wants to help you find your home. You begin to run together, arriving swiftly to the point where the wolf dares not go closer to the human settlement. You wave to her and run home to tell your parents about this wonderful adventure.
translation: 有一天，你独自玩耍，你突然发现没人注意你，大人们都在忙。这是天赐良机，你去外面玩根本不会被发现，你很快就偷偷溜走并走向野外……\n在野外走了几个小时后你终于发觉，你迷路了。彻底的迷路了。当你坐在岩石上哭泣时，你听到身后传来奇怪的声音。当你转身后，你看到一头狼盯着你。它似乎并不危险。过了片刻，你明白它只是想带你回家。你们一起奔跑，迅速到达了一个人类居民区附近，但再往前那只狼就不敢靠近了。你挥手告别它，然后跑回家告诉父母这个奇妙的冒险。

original: What an exciting day!
translation: 令人兴奋的一天！

original: [From.GetFirstName] has been lost in the wilds all day. [From.GetSheHeCap] disappeared this morning and hasn’t been seen since. You sent people out looking but [From.GetSheHe] was nowhere to be found.\nJust as you are getting more and more worried, a happy cry is heard from outside. You look out and see [From.GetFirstName] skipping towards you with an almost euphoric smile on [From.GetHerHis] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] shouts: '[Root.GetFatherMotherCap]! I ran so very far away, and then I met a nice wolf and she was very friendly and then she helped me get home. It was wonderful!'
translation: [From.GetFirstName]已经消失了一整天。[From.GetSheHeCap]今天早上还在，可如今却消失了。你派人去找，可却依旧没找到[From.GetSheHe]。\n就在你越来越焦急时，你听到门外传来了熟悉的声音。你看到[From.GetFirstName]跳到你眼前，[From.GetHerHis]脸上充满几乎是欣快的笑容。[From.GetSheHeCap]喊道：「[Root.GetFatherMotherCap]！我迷路了，然后我遇到一只漂亮的狼，她很友好，是她送我回家的。这真是太奇妙了！」

original: What a strange tale...
translation: 好奇怪的故事……

original: I should probably start keeping [From.GetHerHim] locked up.
translation: 我应该考虑把[From.GetHerHim]关起来。

original: [Root.GetSonDaughter] of the Wolf?
translation: 狼之[Root.GetSonDaughter]？

original: For some time now, you have felt that people talk about you at court. There are conversations that stop as you enter the room, words spoken in hushed voices behind your back, furtive glances as you walk by. With time, you have managed to deduce certain things… you seem to generally be the subject of either curiosity, fear, envy, or a combination of any of the three.\n\nThe word that you most often hear repeated as you eavesdrop on the gossips is... wolf. Indeed, just the other day you heard someone speak a rumor that you’ve heard several times before - that you were born from a wolf mother...
translation: 最近一段时间，你听到宫廷里有人在议论你。当你出现在房间里时议论就终止了，当你离开后又开始小声议论，当你走过时总有人奇怪的看着你。随着时间推移，你成功推断出某种结论……你似乎让这些人好奇、恐惧、嫉妒，又或者是这三种的结合。\n\n当你偷听一些谈话时，你听到最多的似乎就是……狼。事实上，你所听到最多的谣言就是你的母亲是一头狼……

original: Yes, I am a wolf! Raawr!
translation: 是的，我是狼！嚅啊嗷！

original: I'll teach them not to insult my mother!
translation: 我要教训他们别侮辱我母亲！

original: They will never leave me alone!
translation: 他们永远也别想孤立我！

original: These people don't deserve my attention.
translation: 这些人不值得我注意。

original: For some time now, you have heard people at court gossiping about your [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFirstName]. There are conversations that stop as you enter the room, words spoken in hushed voices behind your back, furtive glances as you walk by. With time, you have managed to deduce certain things… [From.GetFirstName] seems to generally be the subject of either curiosity, fear, envy, or a combination of any of the three.\n\nThe word that you most often hear repeated as you eavesdrop on the gossips is... wolf. Indeed, just the other day you heard someone speak a rumor that you’ve heard several times before - that [From.GetHerHis] 'real' mother was a wolf...
translation: 最近一段时间，你听到宫廷里有人在议论你的[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]。当你出现在房间里时议论就终止了，当你离开后又开始小声议论，当你走过时总有人奇怪的看着你。随着时间推移，你成功推断出某种结论……[From.GetFirstName]似乎让这些人好奇、恐惧、嫉妒，又或者是这三种的结合。\n\n当你偷听一些谈话时，你听到最多的似乎就是……狼。事实上，你所听到最多的谣言就是[From.GetHerHis]「真正」的母亲是一头狼……

original: I'm glad they call my [From.GetSonDaughter] a wolf!
translation: 我很高兴他们称我的[From.GetSonDaughter]为一头狼！

original: I must put a stop to this talk.
translation: 我必须停止这种对话。

original: Wolf's Blood
translation: 狼人之血

original: As time passes, the years change but other things stay the same. Somehow, you know the blood of a wolf runs in your veins. This knowledge strengthens you, though sometimes it makes you wonder who you really are...
translation: 随着时间消逝，一些在改变而一些直至不变。无论如何，你知道狼血在你身体里流淌。这一认知给予你力量，有时也让你怀疑你的真正的身世……

original: My future is still to be forged.
translation: 我的未来还未被创造。

original: Your [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFirstName] has become an adult. The strangeness, [From.GetHerHis] unusual wolf-like character, remains however. Perhaps it has even become more pronounced with time..
translation: 你的[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]已经成年。奇怪的是，[From.GetHerHis]性格不寻常地像狼一样，一直存在。似乎还随着时间推移变得更明显……

original: I hope it shall be a blessing and not a curse.
translation: 我希望这是祝福而非诅咒。

original: Wolves
translation: 狼群

original: On the hunt, you keep seeing a group of wolves from time to time. They only seem to appear when you are alone or when no one else is looking, however. It all has a strange exhilarating effect on you, making your blood run quicker and drawing out your hunting instincts.
translation: 在狩猎时，你总能看到狼群。他们似乎只在你一个人的时候或是没有其他人在看着的时候接近你。这给你很奇妙的兴奋感，让你血液沸腾，引导出你的狩猎本能。

original: The hunt! I feel so alive!
translation: 狩猎！我感觉很有活力！

original: Deep in the Night
translation: 深夜

original: For several nights now, you have been unable to sleep well. It usually starts at midnight - the howling of wolves outside. You toss and turn and sometimes go back to sleep, but the howling doesn’t stop until late in the morning. And even then, as the silence falls, you miss the sound of the canine voices on the wind. You feel restless...
translation: 有好几晚上了，你无法入睡。通常这发生在深夜——狼群在外嚎叫。你在榻上辗转反侧，有时能勉强入眠，更多的时候，听着嚎叫到天亮。但是每当安静的时候，你又会思念这个伴随风的野兽的声音。你感到焦躁……

original: What is this?
translation: 这是什么？

original: Income from this $TYPE$
translation: 来自此$TYPE$的收入

original: Global Movement Speed
translation: 全图移动速度

original: Building in §Y$CAPITAL$§!: $BONUS$
translation: 在§Y$CAPITAL$§!的建筑：$BONUS$

original: Dispute [Title.GetBaseName]
translation: 争夺[Title.GetBaseName]

original: Dispute of $OTHER_TITLE$
translation: $OTHER_TITLE$争端

original: Have a settlement construction
translation: 有聚居地建设

original: Does NOT have a settlement construction
translation: 没有聚居地建设

original: Have a $TYPE$
translation: 有一个$TYPE$

original: Does NOT have a $TYPE$
translation: 没有一个$TYPE$

original: Call of the Wolves
translation: 狼群的呼唤

original: It never stops. Night after night, the wolves keep howling outside. No one is sleeping well, but you are probably the one suffering more than anyone. Not only does the howling prevent you from sleeping, but when it stops you can’t stop thinking about it, waiting for it to come back...
translation: 这绝不会停止。当夜晚降临，狼群一直在外面嚎叫。没有人能睡得安稳，但是你所感觉到痛苦可能超过其他人。狼嚎不仅仅让你无法安睡，更让你在它结束后继续想着它，只能等待它再次出现……

original: I’ll go out and meet these wolves, alone.
translation: 我外出与狼群会面，一个人。

original: I’ll go out, bringing guards.
translation: 我将带领护卫外出。

original: I’ll wait - surely, this madness will stop soon.
translation: 我会等待——肯定的，这个疯狂的行为马上就会停止。

original: A wolf among wolves.
translation: 狼群中的一头狼。

original: A large group of armed and armored men set out.
translation: 一大群全副武装的军队出发了。

original: You ignore the wolves from now on.
translation: 从现在起你将忽略狼。

original: Hesitation
translation: 犹豫

original: You go out into the night to meet the howling wolves, approaching a nearby hill where they seem to have gathered. As you and your guards draw closer, the wolves draw back slightly, showing a certain nervousness.
translation: 在夜晚你外出去会见嚎叫的狼群，它们聚集在附近的一个山丘上。当你和你的侍卫慢慢接近，狼群稍微后退，表现的小心翼翼。

original: Guards - leave me to meet these beasts alone.
translation: 侍卫——让我孤身去见这些野兽。

original: You press forward to meet the beasts alone.
translation: 你孤身一人奋力去见野兽。

original: This is pointless - let’s go back.
translation: 这是没有意义的——让我们返回吧。

original: Something is missing
translation: 有东西不见了

original: The wolves have finally stopped their nightly howling outside your home, and there has been silence at night for almost two weeks now. Everyone at your court is relieved, saying they sleep better. Everyone except you... you find that there is a void in your soul, something missing now. You often dream of the wolves howling, and sometimes in your dreams you are running with them through the night, only to wake up early in the morning with a feeling of emptiness.
translation: 狼群已经在你的家园外面停止了嚎叫，并且它们到现在为止已经安静了两个星期。在你宫廷里的每个人都松了一口气，表示他们睡眠更好了，除了你……你发现在你的灵魂里一片空白，有东西不见了。你经常梦到狼群的嚎叫，并且有时你梦到你与狼群奔跑了一昼夜。在凌晨被惊醒时心里不由得产生一种空虚感。

original: Who am I?
translation: 我是谁？

original: The Wolfpack
translation: 狼群集体

original: As you carefully approach the wolves, alone, they stand and wait for you, absolutely still. It turns out to be a pack of about a dozen. As you reach them, they approach you, one by one, smelling you and nudging you with their noses, growling softly. A feeling of belonging wells up inside you, and you feel a quickening throughout your entire body. After a few moments, the wolves begin to move, beckoning you to join them, and you start to jog, breaking into a run. Soon, you are running at full speed, following the pack of wolves into the wild...
translation: 你孤身一人小心翼翼接近狼群时，它们站在那里一动不动像是在等你。它们的数量大概有十来只。当你走进它们，它们一只一只的接近你，用鼻子嗅你的气味并接近你，发出了呜呜的咆哮。一种强烈的归属感在心里产生，并且你的全身身体感觉到一种兴奋。在几分钟后，狼群们开始移动，召唤着你加入它们，你开始慢跑，慢慢变为快跑。不久，你跑步到达满速，随着狼群进入了荒野……

original: Raaaawr!
translation: 嗷呜呜！

original: You join the wolfpack.
translation: 你与狼群融为一体。

original: The Wolves Hunt
translation: 狼群狩猎

original: You have been running with the wolves for a while now. Keeping up with their pace exerts you to near your physical limits, but it also makes you feel strong and alive. You stop occasionally to rest and to drink the cold water of small streams in the wild.\n\nEventually hunger sets in, and you hunt. The pack works in a perfectly coordinated way, cornering a large deer and slaying it. The time has come to feast!
translation: 你已经与狼群一起奔跑了一段时间。紧跟着它们的步伐使你的身体已经接近了极限，但你也感觉到了前所未有的强壮与活力。你偶尔停下来休息，喝着荒野中小溪的冷水。\n\n最终饥饿感来临，你就去打猎。狼群配合得完美无缺、协调一致，围住一头巨鹿并猎杀了它。宴会的时间到了！

original: Rip, tear, devour!
translation: 撕裂，破碎，吞咽！

original: Raw meat? Very well, only because I'm so hungry...
translation: 生肉？好吧，只是因为我很饿……

original: A farewell
translation: 告别

original: You have spent a long time out in the wild with the wolfpack now, losing track of the days. The wolves treat you as one of their own. You’ve always felt the coursing of the wolf blood in your veins, but never as strong as now. You start to realize, however, that you have a home to return to, domains to oversee and envious relatives that might covet your position. Reluctantly, you decide that it’s time to return home.
translation: 现在你需要花费很长时间与狼群在一起，来弥补那些失去的日子。狼群对待你像是对待它们中的一员。你总是感觉到狼的血液在身体里流动，但从来没有像现在一样强烈。不过，你开始意识到，无论如何你还是要回家的，因为还有疆土要照看，而亲属都在暗中窥视你的位置。尽管不情愿，你决定现在是时候回到家中。

original: We will meet again!
translation: 我们将再次相见！

original: The Homecoming
translation: 回家

original: You’ve returned after spending several days out in the wild, running with the wolves. As you appear at court, people stare in awed silence. Your clothes are torn and full of dirt, leaves and blood. Your hair is disheveled and your face has scratches from branches and form the loving attentions of your packmates. But what perhaps impresses your subjects the most is the wide wolfish grin on your face.\n\nYour servants come to meet you, abject and impressed but also clearly trying to hide their fear and worry. Everyone is wondering where you've been.
translation: 你在野外度过几天后，与狼一起跑回来。当你出现在宫廷，人们敬畏的看着你并保持沉默。你的破烂的衣服上布满污垢，树叶和血迹。你的头发乱蓬蓬的，脸上的许多伤口让人们眼中充满关切。但最让你的臣民难忘的是你脸上的如狼一般的微笑。\n\n你的仆从跑来见你，一脸胆怯与敬佩，但也试图隐藏恐惧与担忧的心情。每个人都想知道你去了何处。

original: You’ve returned after spending several days out in the wild, running with the wolves. As you appear at court, people stare in awed silence. Your clothes are torn and full of dirt, leaves and blood. Your hair is disheveled and your face has scratches from branches and form the loving attentions of your packmates. But what perhaps impresses your subjects the most is the wide wolfish grin on your face.\n\n[wolf_worried_homecoming.GetName] rushes out to meet you, fussing over you and asking where you’ve been.
translation: 你在野外度过几天后，与狼一起跑回来。当你出现在宫廷，人们敬畏的看着你并保持沉默。你的破烂的衣服上布满污垢，树叶和血迹。你的头发乱蓬蓬的，脸上的许多伤口让人们眼中充满关切。但最让你的臣民难忘的是你脸上的如狼一般的微笑。\n\n[wolf_worried_homecoming.GetName]跑出来见你，对你大惊小怪，问你去了何处。

original: It's my own business.
translation: 这是我自己的事。

original: Everything will be different now.
translation: 从现在起一切都将不一样。

original: I was thinking of you all the time.
translation: 我一直在思念你。

original: Werewolf
translation: 狼人

original: Strange things happen around this character on some full moons.
translation: 某些满月之夜，奇怪的事情发生这个角色身上。

original: The Werewolf
translation: 狼人

original: You’ve been nervous for the last couple of nights, sleeping restlessly, feeling a strange pull on your mind. During the days you have been tired, but also tense with anticipation, sensing something important arriving.\n\nNow, at night, as you wake and see the full moon rise, you finally understand. It’s the moon, it speaks to you, it is time to rise, time to become the wolf, time to go out, time to be free, time to lose your mind to the moon-madness...
translation: 你神经不安度过了几个晚上，睡眠不好，在脑海里感觉奇怪的召唤。几天后你变得疲惫不堪，但是感觉愈加强烈，感到一些重要的事将要到来。\n\n现在，在夜里，当你清醒时看到满月升起的景象，你终于明白了。那是月亮，它在呼唤你，是时候起床了，是时候变成狼了，是时候外出了，是时候自由了，是时候随着月亮发狂了……

original: Full Moon
translation: 满月

original: The moon has been growing full during the past couple of nights, and with your restlessness is growing. You can sense it coming. It is time again, time to embrace the moon-madness...
translation: 在过去的几个夜晚都是满月，你愈加躁动不安。你能感觉它来了。又是这个时间，是时候拥抱满月狂躁了……

original: What will the night bring?
translation: 夜晚将带来什么？

original: You run through the night, until you reach the highest hill in sight. You spend hours and hours howling at the moon, exulting in her light and in your madness.
translation: 你奔跑了一夜，到达视线里最高的山丘。你花费几个小时对月亮嚎叫，在她的光芒和你的疯狂下狂喜。

original: You run through the night, far and farther still, the moon-madness driving you. You jump ditches, climb hills and swim small rivers. You run and run until you are exhausted, then lay down to sleep on the soft ground. Just to rest a little...
translation: 你奔跑了一夜，月亮离你依旧那么遥远，操作着你疯狂的行为。你越过沟壑，攀爬山丘，游过河流。你不断地奔跑直到你筋疲力尽，接着你躺在柔软的草地上慢慢睡着，就休息一会儿……

original: So good but so tiring...
translation: 如此美妙，尽管筋疲力尽……

original: You run through the night, seeking prey. You eventually find it, and you pounce. Tearing, slashing, gouging, all the while howling like the wolf you are. In the end the panicked mooing stops...
translation: 你为了搜寻猎物奔跑了一夜。你最终找到了，猛然扑过去。撕咬，猛嚼，咀嚼，在这个时候你的嚎叫完全像一头狼。最后惊恐的哞叫声停止了……

original: Blood!
translation: 血！

original: You run through the night, seeking prey. You eventually find it, and you pounce. Tearing, slashing, gouging, all the while howling like the wolf you are. In the end the panicked squealing stops...
translation: 你为了搜寻猎物奔跑了一夜。你最终找到了，猛然扑过去。撕咬，猛嚼，咀嚼，在这个时候你的嚎叫完全像一头狼。最后惊恐的嗷叫声停止了……

original: You run through the night, seeking prey. You eventually find it, and you pounce. Tearing, slashing, gouging, all the while howling like the wolf you are. In the end the panicked howling stops...
translation: 你为了搜寻猎物奔跑了一夜。你最终找到了，猛然扑过去。撕咬，猛嚼，咀嚼，在这个时候你的嚎叫完全像一头狼。最后惊恐的吠叫声停止了……

original: You run through the night, seeking prey. You eventually find it, and you pounce. Tearing, slashing, gouging, all the while howling like the wolf you are. In the end the panicked screaming stops...
translation: 你为了搜寻猎物奔跑了一夜。你最终找到了，猛然扑过去。撕咬，猛嚼，咀嚼，在这个时候你的嚎叫完全像一头狼。最后惊恐的尖叫声停止了……

original: Killed a cow.
translation: 杀死一头牛。

original: Killed a pig.
translation: 杀死一只猪。

original: Killed a dog.
translation: 杀死一只狗。

original: Killed someone.
translation: 杀死某人。

original: The Morning After
translation: 清晨之后

original: You wake in the morning, but you feel as though you hadn’t slept at all. Your muscles ache, and your throat is sore. As you try to speak, you realize that you are quite hoarse. How could that be? You don’t remember.
translation: 你在清晨醒来，但是你感觉你似乎一直没有休息。你的肌肉疼痛，嗓子沙哑。当你尝试去说话，你意识到你完全的嘶哑了。这怎么可能呢？你已经不记得了。

original: You wake in the morning, but you feel as though you hadn’t slept at all. You vaguely remember having nightmares. You are cold as well, and wet. What happened during the night? You don’t remember at all.
translation: 你在清晨醒来，但是你感觉你似乎一直没有休息。你模糊的回忆着你的梦境。你感觉冷，而且湿润。在夜里发生了什么？你已经不记得了。

original: You wake in the morning, but you feel as though you hadn’t slept at all. You vaguely remember having nightmares. You seem to have something wet and sticky on your chest. As you look down, you realize that you are covered in blood. It’s clearly not yours, and you don’t remember how it got there. There is something about it, however, that awakens a vague exhilaration in you...
translation: 你在清晨醒来，但是你感觉你似乎一直没有休息。你模糊的回忆着你的梦境。你感觉到有一些潮湿的东西粘在你的胸口。当你看胸口时，你意识到你全身都是血迹。那绝对不是你的，并且你不记得是怎么沾上的。肯定发生了什么事情，无论如何，这唤醒了你的一种模糊的兴奋感……

original: Strange.
translation: 奇怪。

original: Hoarse
translation: 嘶哑

original: This character has overexerted [GetHerHis] voice and can hardly speak.
translation: 这个角色过度使用[GetHerHis]声音，几乎不能说话。

original: Full Moon Fever
translation: 满月狂躁

original: This character recently drew blood under the full moon.
translation: 这个角色最近在满月下进食血液。

original: The blood and spirit of the wolf is within you. You feel it as you walk among the people - you are not like them, you are superior. And the air is fragrant with the smell of meat, it is all around you. It could all be yours for the taking, if you are careful...
translation: 你内心有狼的血液和灵魂。你感觉到你虽然待在民众之中——但你完全不像他们，你是优秀的。并且在空气中有肉的香味。他们就在你周围。他们和你交谈，如果你小心行事……

original: The wolf is hungry!
translation: 狼饿了！

original: I... must... resist... it...
translation: 我……必须……抗拒……这……

original: The moon is high in the night sky. She casts her light over the lands, illuminating the night. You turn your gaze skywards, sensing a strange longing. Your wolf’s blood runs quicker, the moon beckons. You raise your voice in tribute to her...
translation: 月亮在夜空中高高的悬挂。她撒下一片光明，照亮了夜晚。你注视着月光，产生一种强烈的向往。你的狼血被月光召唤，在快速流淌。你用自己的声音向她表示敬意……

original: Aoooouuuuuuuu!!!
translation: 啊嗷嗷嗷嗷呜呜呜呜呜呜呜呜！！！

original: One night at dinner, you accidentally drop a piece of meat on the floor. A small dog runs up and snatches it before you can grab it. Enraged, without thinking, you draw your sword and jump at the dog, skewering it. [wolf_hunting_instinct_at_court_courtier.GetTitledName] is horrified, as you have just killed [wolf_hunting_instinct_at_court_courtier.GetHerHis] favorite dog.
translation: 一天在晚饭后，你不小心掉落了一片肉在地板上。一只小狗赶忙跑过来在你捡起之前抢走了它。突然间你感觉被激怒了，你直觉般的拿起剑挥向了狗并杀死了它。[wolf_hunting_instinct_at_court_courtier.GetTitledName]被吓着了，因为你刚刚杀死了[wolf_hunting_instinct_at_court_courtier.GetHerHis]最喜欢的狗。

original: No one touches my meat.
translation: 没有可以动我的肉。

original: In your daily martial training and discussions on military matters with your commanders, you find that there are often moves and tactics that occur to no one else but you. People seem to be impressed by your instinctive understanding of encirclement tactics, trickery and stealth.
translation: 在你进行日常的武术训练时你和你的指挥官讨论军事问题，你发现经常有一些行动和战术只有你想得出来。你本能的明白包围战术、诡计和欺骗，使人留了深刻印象。

original: The wolves always catch their prey.
translation: 狼总是能抓住它们的猎物。

original: You often run and wrestle to keep fit. It is a hunger and desire for the hunt that drives you, and you often see the movement patterns of wolves before your inner eye as you train.
translation: 你为了保持强壮经常奔跑和摔跤。这是饥饿以及对狩猎的渴望驱使着你，并且当你在训练时，你经常在第六感里看到狼的移动模式。

original: I feel strong!
translation: 我感到强壮！

original: You consider yourself a clever person, effectively applying your mind to any problem that needs solving. You have found that true strength comes when the animal cunning of the wolf is added to the human intellect.
translation: 你考虑到你是有智慧的人，在解决问题时能有效的使用自己的心智。你发现真正的力量是将狼的狡猾与人类的智慧结合。

original: Few have it.
translation: 世间少有能做到的。

original: Lately, you have been feeling a strange wolfish hunger as you look at some members of your court. You have been taught to control your desires like everyone else, but there is a deep animal instinct within you that keeps increasing in intensity, pressing more and more on your patience. You feel it will soon no longer be possible to control it - and perhaps you don’t want to?
translation: 最近，当你看到你宫廷的一些成员时感到了一种奇特的饥饿。你需要控制自己的欲望让自己表现的和别人一样，但是这里有一种深深的动物本能在你心中快速增加，对你的忍耐造成越来越大的压力。你感觉到这本能不久将不受控制——或许你并不想控制？

original: Growl.
translation: 咆哮。

original: It's like an animal inside me!
translation: 好似一个动物住在我心里！

original: I smell new smells...
translation: 我闻到了新的气味……

original: The lone wolf will not survive, and prosperity is only possible when the pack hunts together as one. You know this, and you feel a deep need to include everyone and thus make your court stronger.
translation: 孤狼将不能生存，只有狼群一起行动，如同一头狼那样去捕猎，繁荣才有可能。你明白这个道理，并且你深深地感觉到你应当去接纳每一个人，让你的宫廷更加强壮。

original: I almost licked someone today.
translation: 今天我几乎要吃掉一个人。

original: I have a new sense of... belonging.
translation: 我有一种新的……归属感。

original: The prey starts and flees at the slightest sound. The prey is fearful. The wolf goes forth without fear, knowing [Root.GetSheHe] will be the one to eat and not be eaten, knowing [Root.GetSheHe] will prevail.
translation: 猎物开始逃跑并发出细微的声音。猎物害怕极了。狼毫无畏惧地向前，知道[Root.GetSheHe]将获胜，而且[Root.GetSheHe]将是开吃而不是被吃的那一个。

original: I am the wolf.
translation: 我是狼。

original: I see it now.
translation: 现在我能看见它了。

original: The strongest are the ones who survive. The weak shall perish, such is the law of the steppe. And on the steppe, the wolf is strongest.
translation: 存活的将是最强壮的。弱肉强食，这就是草原的法则。在草原里，狼是最强壮的。

original: The law must be respected.
translation: 法则应该受到尊崇。

original: I did not see it before.
translation: 我在之前没有见过它。

original: There is a rage that strikes you sometimes. They say your ancestors were wolves, and maybe they are right.
translation: 有时你会控制不住自己的愤怒。他们说你的祖先是狼，可能他们是正确的。

original: Let the wolf rage.
translation: 让狼愤怒吧。

original: I cannot stop it!
translation: 我不能停止它！

original: Occasionally, as you look into a mirror, it occurs to you that your face more and more resembles that of a wolf. It seems to be a slow but inexorable change occurring over the years. You can’t quite decide if you like it or not, but you sense that people at court have started to look at you in a funny way.
translation: 当你看着镜子时，你偶然发现你的脸越来越像一头狼。这缓慢的无法逆转的变化似乎是在这几年里发生的。你无法弄清自己喜不喜欢这种变化，但你感觉到宫廷里的人们开始以看笑话的眼光看你。

original: There is nothing I can do about it.
translation: 关于这个我没有什么能做的。

original: And they used to think me fair...
translation: 他们曾经认为我很美貌……

original: Sometimes when you sit down to reason and try to straighten out a problem, your mind only bends back in on itself. Your almost seem to forget your learning as animal instincts take over, seeking solutions that are more simple and direct.
translation: 有时你坐下来，想要理清一个问题，你的心灵只能由它自己决定一切。你几乎忘记了你的学识，因为动物的本能掌管了你的心灵，它寻求更简单直接的解决方法。

original: Maybe instinct is better than learning.
translation: 可能本能强于习得。

original: The moon is high in the night sky. She casts Her light over the lands, illuminating the night. You turn your gaze skywards, basking in Her radiant love. Your wolf’s blood runs quicker as She beckons to you. You slowly raise your voice in tribute to Her, howling as you would howl until the world ends. It fills you with joy, and you exult in Her being, knowing that She and you are one!
translation: 月亮在夜空中高悬。她向大地洒下她的光明，照亮了整个夜晚。你注视这月亮，沉浸在她广撒人间的爱当中。感觉她向你招手，你的狼血液快速流淌。你慢慢提升音量，向月亮表示敬意，似乎要咆哮到世界终结。这举动让你心情愉悦，你为她的存在欢呼，心里知道她和你是一体的！

original: Wolf's Legacy
translation: 狼的遗产

original: Little [From.GetFirstName] is not like most other children. You notice that [From.GetSheHe] growls when other children cry, and is quicker and stronger than other children [From.GetHerHis] age. There is also that sniffing thing [From.GetSheHe] does. You recognize the signs - [From.GetSheHe] has inherited your blood, the blood of wolves...
translation: 小[From.GetFirstName]跟多数其他小孩不一样。你发现[From.GetSheHe]在嚎叫而其他小孩在哭闹，而且和[From.GetHerHis]同龄人相比更加敏捷和强壮。同样的[From.GetSheHe]也会嗅来嗅去。你认出了这些征兆——[From.GetSheHe]继承了你的血液，狼之血……

original: Little [From.GetFirstName] is not like most other children. You notice that [From.GetSheHe] growls when other children cry, and is quicker and stronger than other children [From.GetHerHis] age. There is also that sniffing thing [From.GetSheHe] does. If you didn’t know better, you’d say [From.GetSheHe] has inherited [From.GetHerHis] [Spouse.GetFatherMother]’s blood, the blood of wolves...
translation: 小[From.GetFirstName]跟多数其他小孩不一样。你发现[From.GetSheHe]在嚎叫而其他小孩在哭闹，而且和[From.GetHerHis]同龄人相比更加敏捷和强壮。同样的[From.GetSheHe]也会嗅来嗅去。就算你什么都不知道，你也会说[From.GetSheHe]继承了[From.GetHerHis][Spouse.GetFatherMother]血液，狼之血……

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] will grow to be a strong [From.GetManWoman]!
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]将成为更加强壮[From.GetManWoman]！

original: Alas, I wish it were not so!
translation: 唉呀，我不希望如此！

original: the Wolf
translation: 狼

original: Perform Sky Burial
translation: 实施天葬

original: I can bury my predecessor by leaving the body outside to be consumed by nature.
translation: 我可以埋葬我的前辈，将尸体留在野外，让大自然消化。

original: Perform a sky burial.
translation: 实施天葬。

original: Sky Burial
translation: 天葬

original: I shall take him to the mountains myself.
translation: 我将亲自带他去山上。

original: No. He shall have a golden tomb worthy of his name.
translation: 不，黄金坟墓才配得上他的名号。

original: He shall not be eaten by birds, but by olgoi-khorkhoi!
translation: 他不应该由鸟儿吃掉，而应该由死亡蠕虫！

original: A sky burial is prepared.
translation: 准备天葬。

original: The construction of a mighty tomb begins.
translation: 开始建造一个巨大的坟墓。

original: It will be a difficult journey across the desert. Greatly risking your life. Those with health concerns would likely perish..
translation: 穿越沙漠的旅行是艰辛的。你的生命将面对巨大的风险。有健康问题的人很可能丧命。

original: Bad Weather
translation: 坏天气

original: On your way towards the mountains your party runs into a small storm with heavy rain. The rain makes the earth soft and the air cold.
translation: 在你向山上行走时你们遇到了一次小型风暴和大雨，雨水使得土地泥泞，天气寒冷。

original: Let us find shelter until it passes.
translation: 我们找个避雨的地方等它过去。

original: A little rain has never killed anyone!
translation: 这点小雨打不死人！

original: A Lone Hermit
translation: 一个孤独的隐士

original: On your way to the mountains, you encounter a lonely hermit. He doesn't own much besides a worn down tent, an old and sick horse, along with a few sheep. But the old man invites you to drink some salted tea with him. As you talk, you realize that you are enjoying his company!
translation: 在你去深山的路上，你遇见一个独孤的隐士。他拥有一个破旧的帐篷，又老又生病的马和几只羊。但是老隐士邀请你共饮一些咸奶茶。在谈论中发现，你很喜欢与他往来。

original: Here. Take this.
translation: 来，拿着这个。

original: Why don't you join us?
translation: 你何不加入我们？

original: Thank you, but I must be going.
translation: 谢谢，但是我必须离开了。

original: Sky Burial
translation: 天葬

original: After reaching the mountains, you carefully place the body in what you deem a good location. You can already hear the vultures soaring above as you perform the necessary rituals. When you start to make your way back down, it doesn't take long until the vultures begin to tear at the flesh with both beak and claw.
translation: 到达山里之后，你小心地把尸体放在你选定的好地方。当你执行必要的仪式时，你已听到了秃鹰在头顶盘旋。等到你离开后不久，秃鹰便开始用爪和嘴撕肉。

original: You are with [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] now.
translation: 现在你和[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]同在。

original: Being Followed
translation: 被跟踪

original: Ever since you left the mountains, you have had the odd feeling that someone is following you. But when you turn to look, there is nothing there. But as you reach the top of a small hill, you quickly turn your head and see that one of the vultures has been following you! And not just any vulture. It's a bearded vulture!
translation: 自从你离开这片群山，你有一种奇怪感觉，似乎有人在跟踪你。但是当你回头看时，那里什么也没有。但你来到一座小山头，你快速回头，看到秃鹫群中的一只在跟着你！不仅仅是普通的秃鹫，这是一只有胡子的秃鹫！

original: Can I keep it?!
translation: 我能留着它吗？！

original: Just scare it away.
translation: 把它吓跑就好。

original: Constructing Tomb
translation: 建造坟墓

original: You have selected a remote and secluded location for the tomb. The men are ready and waiting for your command to start digging.
translation: 你已为墓地选中一处偏僻隐蔽的位置。劳力已准备好，只待你的命令便开始挖掘。

original: Well then. Put your back into it!
translation: 非常好，埋头干吧！

original: Golden Tomb
translation: 黄金坟墓

original: The tomb stand completed. It sparkles with all the gold and steel within. You make sure to properly seal and cover the tomb, taking extra caution to make sure that no markings reveals its location. You kill all the workers so that no one but you, and your personal guard, know where to find it.
translation: 坟墓完成了。内里黄金和钢铁闪闪发光。你确保已恰当地密封并掩盖这个坟墓，使用非常小心翼翼的手段确保在这个位置上没有任何痕迹。你杀死了所有的工人，这样一来除了你自己和你的私人卫兵，没人知道在哪里找到它。

original: Magnificent, and no one shall ever disturb it.
translation: 如此壮丽，没有什么比得过它。

original: Have the guards killed as well.
translation: 把卫兵也杀了。

original: The Gobi Desert
translation: 戈壁滩

original: The days have been agonizingly warm. Your water has almost run out. The body has already started to decompose and can be smelled from quite the distance. Yet, you haven't reached the place where the death worm is rumored to exist. The others of your party beg you to go back.
translation: 天气温暖得让人痛苦，你带来的水几近用尽。尸体已开始腐烂，老远就能闻到臭味。

original: Nonsense! We must continue!
translation: 荒谬！我们必须继续！

original: This was a bad idea.. Lets go back..
translation: 这是一个坏主意……我们回去吧……

original: The Gobi Desert
translation: 戈壁滩

original: Finally reaching the area where the olgoi-khorkhoi are supposedly found, you feel satisfied with your achievement. You see no sign of the worm, but you are sure that it lurkers just beneath the sands! You place the body on the ground, or what's left of it, to be sacrificed to the mighty creature.
translation: 终于到达了这片区域，死亡蠕虫有可能就在这里，你对你的成就很满意。你没有发现任何蠕虫的痕迹，但是你能确定它就潜藏就在这片沙滩下面！你把尸体放在地上，至少是还没腐烂的那部分尸体，已献祭给这个强大的生物。

original: A worthy burial! Now to get back home..
translation: 一场肃穆的葬礼！现在我们回家吧……

original: safely reaching home.
translation: 安全到达家中。

original: That was fun! But now, I must rest.. right here..
translation: 真有趣！但是现在，我需要休息一下……就在这里……

original: Home at Last
translation: 终于到家了

original: It was a difficult journey, but you made it home safely. Most of your party perished in the desert, and it seems that you alone were able to complete the journey without severely straining your health.
translation: 这是一场艰难的旅行，但最终你安全地回到家中。大部分和你一起的人已经葬身沙漠，并且你似乎成功在独自又没有损害健康的情况下完成了这个旅行。

original: What doesn't kill you makes you stronger!
translation: 杀不死你的东西，会让你更强大！

original: You and your men are practicing wrestling when you notice a crowd starting to form around you. Wrestling is an honored tradition that keeps nomad warriors fit for war, but ever so often it happens that training sessions turn into competitive spectacles. Your men have already started putting on a show for the crowd. They beckon you to join them.
translation: 你和你的伙伴正在练习摔跤，你发现人群开始聚集在你们周围。摔跤是一个值得尊敬的传统，使得游牧的战士为战争做好准备，因此经常发生训练演变成竞技大赛的事情。你的伙伴已准备好向人群展示能力。他们呼唤你加入他们。

original: I can't disappoint the audience, now can I?
translation: 我决不能让观众失望，但我现在能做到吗？

original: You decide to join the contest.
translation: 你决定加入比赛。

original: There's no time for this, get back to training the lot of you!
translation: 没时间玩这个了，你们都给我回去训练！

original: You can have your fun, but I'll sit this one out...
translation: 你们自己玩吧，我坐在场外就好……

original: With matches lasting upwards of two hours, Bökh wrestling is an excellent way to prove your endurance. You and your opponent are expected to dance as you enter and leave the contest field, and it's also expected of the winner to help the opponent up off the ground as the match is over. You know that this will require you to exert yourself to your very limit.
translation: 比赛已进行了两个小时，摔跤确实是证明你耐力的绝佳方式。人们期待你和你的对手进入以及离开比赛场地时跳舞同乐，并且希望在比赛结束时获胜者扶起对手。你知道这需要你发挥出自己的极限水平。

original: I'll challenge one of my greatest warriors!
translation: 我将向我最厉害的战士挑战！

original: I'll challenge my trusty steed, Glitterhoof!
translation: 我将挑战我最信任的战马，闪蹄！

original: Is challenged to a wrestling match!
translation: 在摔跤比赛中受到挑战！

original: Naturally, I expect whoever I challenge to yield.
translation: 人之常情，我希望我挑战的那个人会自己投降。

original: On the other hand, this seems dangerous...
translation: 另一方面看来，这似乎很危险……

original: The crowd cheers as you and your opponent dance into the contest field. After circling for a while you charge in, locking yourself with the opposing wrestler. After several minutes of furious grappling you spot a weakness in your opponent's defense. You quickly let go of his upper body and grab his legs, tipping him over. He falls over and his elbows touch the ground – you are the victor!
translation: 人们发出激烈的欢呼，你和你的对手跳舞进入竞赛场。环绕了一阵子，你冲锋上前，成功锁住了你的对手。几分钟的激烈地面缠斗之后，你发现对手防御中的破绽。你快速松开他的上身抓住他的腿部，将他整个翻了过来。他摔了个底朝天，手肘碰到了地面——你是胜利者！

original: My opponent was pathetic, I won't help him up!
translation: 我的对手真可怜，我不会帮助他站起来！

original: I have triumphed! Now take my hand, I'll help you up.
translation: 我赢了！现在抓住我的手，我会帮助你站起来。

original: I may have won, but we'll share the glory!
translation: 我虽然胜利了，但我们将一起分享这个荣誉！

original: That was a thrilling experience! Meet me in my tent later?
translation: 这真是刺激！等会来我的帐篷？

original: The crowd cheers as you and your opponent dance into the contest field. After circling for a while you charge in, locking yourself with the opposing wrestler. After several minutes of furious grappling you start to feel the strain. Suddenly your opponent catches you off guard and grabs your legs. He lifts you into the air and lets you fall to the ground. You've been defeated!
translation: 人们发出激烈的欢呼，你和你的对手跳舞进入竞赛场。环绕了一阵子，你冲锋上前，成功锁住了你的对手。几分钟的激烈地面缠斗之后，你开始感到被勒紧。突然你的对手趁你不警惕时抓住你的腿，他将你整个举到空中再让你自由落向地面。你被击败了！

original: Maybe this wasn't such a good idea after all...
translation: 到头来这或许不是一个好主意……

original: I was bested fair and square, my opponent is truly worthy!
translation: 我输得心服口服，我的对手值得尊敬。

original: You dare defeat the Khan? Now feel my wrath!
translation: 你竟敢击败可汗？现在感受我的愤怒吧！

original: I may have lost, but it was a thrilling experience!
translation: 我或许输了，但这真是刺激的经历！

original: Wrestling Master
translation: 摔跤大师

original: This character has mastered the skill of wrestling.
translation: 这个角色精通摔跤的技能。

original: Declined Wrestling Contest
translation: 拒绝摔跤比赛

original: This character declined a challenge to a wrestling contest.
translation: 这个角色拒绝了一场摔跤比赛的挑战。

original: You win!
translation: 你赢了！

original: Revoke County Capital status
translation: 撤销省份首府地位

original: I can revoke the county capital status of this holding.
translation: 我可以撤回此地产的省份首府地位。

original: Pillage [Root.GetName]
translation: 掠夺[Root.GetName]

original: Choose a Commander to lead the Right Flank
translation: 选择一个指挥官去指挥右翼

original: Choose a Commander to lead the Center Flank
translation: 选择一个指挥官去指挥中军

original: Choose a Commander to lead the Left Flank
translation: 选择一个指挥官去指挥左翼

original: Choose a Commander to lead this Subunit
translation: 选择一个指挥官去指挥二级单位

original: Commander
translation: 指挥官

original: I’ve invited people in my court to take part in a war game in which we practice defending our land from invading enemies. We will use wooden models to represent invading armies, and I shall have to use clever tactics to defeat my opponent.
translation: 我将邀请我宫廷的人们加入这场战争游戏，练习从敌人手中保卫我们的土地。我们将使用木制的模型来代表入侵的军队，并且我必须使用诡秘的战术来击败我的对手。

original: This will be fun.
translation: 这会很有趣。

original: Not today. I'm busy.
translation: 今天就算了，我很忙。

original: Nobody wanted to participate in the war game exercise today.
translation: 今天没有人想要加入战争游戏操练。

original: That is disappointing.
translation: 令人失望。

original: As we assign tasks for the war game, we decide that [defender.GetFirstName] will defend with me, while [attacker.GetFirstName] will be leading the invading forces.
translation: 我们为战争游戏分配任务，决定让[defender.GetFirstName]与我一同防御，而[attacker.GetFirstName]将领导入侵势力。

original: Let the best warlords win.
translation: 最强的将领会赢得胜利。

original: At the beginning of the war game your enemy decides to do a strong frontal assault towards your center flank.
translation: 在战争游戏一开始，你的敌人决定针对你的中军进行一次强力前线攻击。

original: Use all means to reinforce and strengthen the center.
translation: 利用一切手段巩固和加强中军。

original: Slowly withdraw the forces in the center.
translation: 慢慢从中军撤出军队。

original: The war game gets intense as you use your forces to reinforce the center, while [attacker.GetFirstName]’s troops begins to pressure your flanks, and they’re failing fast.  [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we should respond with pressure in the center flank.
translation: 战争游戏愈演愈烈，你使用你的兵力加强中军，而[attacker.GetFirstName]的部队开始对你的两翼造成压力，两翼因而开始快速溃退。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们应该以中军的压力作为回应。

original: The war game gets intense as you use your forces to reinforce the center, while [attacker.GetFirstName]’s troops begins to pressure your flanks, and they’re failing fast. [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we should use the cavalry on the side flanks.
translation: 战争游戏愈演愈烈，你使用你的兵力加强中军，而[attacker.GetFirstName]的部队开始对你的两翼造成压力，两翼因而开始快速溃退。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们应该在两翼使用骑兵。

original: Use cavalry to suppress the side flanks.
translation: 使用骑兵压制两翼。

original: Try to push through the center.
translation: 尝试打穿中军。

original: Focus our efforts on keeping one flank up.
translation: 集中我们的力量，稳住一个侧翼。

original: The enemy forces of [attacker.GetFirstName] are keeping up the pressure on the center, while a group of enemy cavalry shows up behind your line. [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we beat the enemy cavalry decisively.
translation: [attacker.GetFirstName]的敌方部队一直保持着对中军的压力，同时一组敌军骑兵出现在你的阵列后方。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们果断回击敌军骑兵。

original: The enemy forces of [attacker.GetFirstName] are keeping up the pressure on the center, while a group of enemy cavalry shows up behind your line. [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we should make sure the center flank is reinforced.
translation: [attacker.GetFirstName]的敌方部队一直保持着对中军的压力，同时一组敌军骑兵出现在你的阵列后方。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们应该确保中军的稳固。

original: Break off a large unit from your side flank to combat the cavalry.
translation: 从你的侧翼分割出一大股部队与那队骑兵战斗。

original: Scramble together a small force to catch the cavalry.
translation: 拼凑一只小部队来抓捕那队骑兵。

original: Focus our efforts on the center.
translation: 将注意力集中到中军。

original: While your troops withdraw from the center flank [attacker.GetFirstName] decides to push the center flank hard. [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we surround the enemy center.
translation: 当你的部队从中军撤走，[attacker.GetFirstName]决定硬攻中军。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们包围敌人中军。

original: While your troops withdraw from the center flank [attacker.GetFirstName] decides to push the center flank hard. [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we keep the formation.
translation: 当你的部队从中军撤走，[attacker.GetFirstName]决定硬攻中军。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们保持队形。

original: Bring all the reserves to the center.
translation: 把所有的后备派到中军。

original: Retreat the side flanks to keep the line.
translation: 撤下侧翼保持阵型。

original: Fold the side flanks to surround the enemy.
translation: 合拢侧翼包围敌人。

original: [attacker.GetFirstName] decides to hold [attacker.GetHerHis] line when our troops withdraw from the center flank. [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we charge the center while the enemy hesitates.
translation: 当我们的部队从中军撤出，[attacker.GetFirstName]决定保持[attacker.GetHerHis]阵型。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们在敌人犹豫的时候冲锋对方中军。

original: [attacker.GetFirstName] decides to hold [attacker.GetHerHis] line when our troops withdraw from the center flank. [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we strengthen our side flanks with our idle troops.
translation: 当我们的部队从中军撤出，[attacker.GetFirstName]决定保持[attacker.GetHerHis]阵型。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们使用闲置部队来加强侧翼。

original: Prepare a counterattack in the center flank.
translation: 在中军准备反击。

original: Use our center troops as reserve for our now pressured side flanks.
translation: 将我们的中军作为后备来缓解我们侧翼的压力。

original: Prepare a large push on our left flank with support from the center.
translation: 在中军的支持下准备好从左翼推进。

original: At the beginning of the war game the enemy quickly tries to advance up the hills in the area to get a strategical advantage.
translation: 战争游戏一开始，敌人意图迅速推进到此区域的山丘上以取得战略优势。

original: Bring all of our forces to contest the defensive grounds.
translation: 派出我们所有的力量抢占防守阵地。

original: Rush forward with a light skirmish force before their force reach the hill.
translation: 轻装散兵部队急行军，抢在他们的军队之前抵达那座山丘。

original: When our troops reach the top of the hill [attacker.GetFirstName] smiles at us. He reveals the hidden troops that were deployed on the other side of the hill. [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we should focus on taking down one of the enemy’s troops quickly.
translation: 当我们的军队到达山顶时，[attacker.GetFirstName]对我们露出笑容。他透露一只隐藏部队早已布置在山的另一侧。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们集中兵力，迅速击垮敌人的一支部队。

original: When our troops reach the top of the hill [attacker.GetFirstName] smiles at us. He reveals the hidden troops that were deployed on the other side of the hill. [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we split up our forces to handle the enemy.
translation: 当我们的军队到达山顶时，[attacker.GetFirstName]对我们露出笑容。他透露一只隐藏部队早已布置在山的另一侧。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们分兵应付敌人。

original: Let your troops take up a defensive position and brace for impact.
translation: 让你的部队占据防守位置应对冲击。

original: Break off a small force to combat the hidden troops.
translation: 分离一小只部队与隐藏部队战斗。

original: Quickly try to defeat the hidden troops.
translation: 尝试迅速打败隐藏部队。

original: The enemy ascends the hill quickly alongside our troops. As we reach the top of the hill simultaneously, our armies clash in an outright brawl. [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we spread our tired troops evenly on the field.
translation: 敌人很快就随我们的军队登上了山。当双方同时抵达山顶时，我们的军队直接开始了面对面的肉搏战。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们应该在战场上均匀分散我们疲惫的部队。

original: The enemy ascends the hill quickly alongside our troops. As we reach the top of the hill simultaneously, our armies clash in an outright brawl. [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we should break the enemies side flank.
translation: 敌人很快就随我们的军队登上了山。当双方同时抵达山顶时，我们的军队直接开始了面对面的肉搏战。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们应该突破敌人的侧翼。

original: Spread out heavy and light troops evenly along the line.
translation: 沿前线均匀散开轻重部队。

original: Focus your heavy troops in the center.
translation: 将你的重装部队集中在中军。

original: Put all available troops on the left flank.
translation: 将所有可用的部队压在左翼。

original: [attacker.GetFirstName] decides to charge forward with his troops towards our skirmishing troops, forfeiting the opportunity to get a position on the hills. [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we should move our troops to the hill.
translation: [attacker.GetFirstName]决定用军队向着我们的散兵部队冲锋，放弃夺取山丘高地的机会。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们应该将部队移动到山上。

original: [attacker.GetFirstName] decides to charge forward with his troops towards our skirmishing troops, forfeiting the opportunity to get a position on the hills. [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we should interfere and engage the enemy.
translation: [attacker.GetFirstName]决定用军队向着我们的散兵部队冲锋，放弃夺取山丘高地的机会。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们应该直接与敌人交战。

original: Try to flank the enemy with your main force.
translation: 尝试用你的主力包抄敌军。

original: Rush forward to help your skirmishers.
translation: 冲上去帮助散兵。

original: Use cavalry to cover the skirmishers retreat while taking the hill.
translation: 用骑兵掩护散兵撤退并夺取山丘。

original: [attacker.GetFirstName]’s troops continue to slowly advance up the hill, pressing on despite the assault of our skirmishers. [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we should climb the hills fast.
translation: [attacker.GetFirstName]继续缓慢地向山上推进，即使面对我们散兵的攻击也继续压上。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们加快上山速度。

original: [attacker.GetFirstName]’s troops continue to slowly advance up the hill, pressing on despite the assault of our skirmishers. [defender.GetFirstName] suggests that we should attack them from the back.
translation: [attacker.GetFirstName]继续缓慢地向山上推进，即使面对我们散兵的攻击也继续压上。[defender.GetFirstName]建议我们绕后攻击敌人。

original: Charge them while they're weakened by the pressure.
translation: 在压力削弱他们的时候发起冲锋。

original: Advance our main army to take a higher position than their troops.
translation: 推进我们的主力，占据比敌军更高的位置。

original: Circle around the slowed down enemy and attack from behind.
translation: 绕行缓速敌军，从后方进行攻击。

original: Our opponent’s troops are clearly tired, and by using the high ground to our advantage, we quickly gain the upper hand. It is concluded that the defending team is victorious.
translation: 我们对手的部队明显露出疲态，利用高地的优势，我们很快占据上风。最终防御方赢得胜利。

original: We manage to exhaust our opponent by holding a stable line, standing as clear victors of the war game.
translation: 我们成功保持稳定的阵型，拖垮我们的敌军，成为战争游戏显而易见的胜利者。

original: After discovering the small enemy force, it was clear we had the advantage in numbers. With even ground we manage to whittle down the enemy until, finally, our team could claim victory.
translation: 发现了小规模的敌军之后，很明显我们在数量上占优。随着我们成功将敌人一点点削减，最终，我们队伍可以宣布胜利。

original: As we launch our attack we manage to break the opponent’s center, giving us the opportunity to subdue their split forces with ease. We stand uncontested as victors of the war game.
translation: 我们发动攻击，成功击溃敌人的中军，有了这个机会我们轻松地击败了被分割开的敌人。我们是战争游戏毫无争议的胜利者。

original: When the opposing forces foolishly advance we easily surround them, gaining the upper hand as they are unable to break free. It is a decisive victory for the defending team.
translation: 当敌军愚蠢地前进时我们轻易的包围了他们，占据上风并且他们无法打破封锁。这对于防卫方是决定性的胜利。

original: The opposing forces focused their efforts on our center, but were unable to break it. However, our side flanks managed to advance in return, surrounding their center flank and securing our victory.
translation: 敌军集中兵力攻击我们中军，但始终无法突破它。然而，我们的侧翼成功反推，保卫他们的中军并确保了我们的胜利。

original: As we keep the troops at the center mostly unused, the enemy manages to weaken the side flanks. Slowly but steadily, we are defeated.
translation: 我们将部队聚集在中央大部分闲置不用，敌军则成功削弱我们侧翼。缓慢而稳定地，我们失败了。

original: Our decision to attack an opponent who holds a defensive high-ground proves disastrous. As our troops suffer massive losses, we are forced to admit defeat.
translation: 我们进攻敌人防守高地的决定完全是个灾难。由于我们的军队遭受了巨大损失，我们不得不承认失败。

original: With our troops being split up and exhausted, we cannot fight the united forces of [attacker.GetFirstName]. We fail to inflict any lasting damage on our opponent, and are quickly overwhelmed. It is clear that we are defeated.
translation: 随着我们的军队被分割和耗尽精力，我们无法再对抗[attacker.GetFirstName]的联军。我们不能对敌人造成持续的伤害，并被迅速压制。很明显我们被击败了。

original: In the melee struggle our side flank is the first to falter, as the tired troops leave a clear opportunity for our opponent to take advantage of. We are quickly overpowered, and our opponent stands as the indisputable victor.
translation: 在近距离战斗中我们的侧翼首先动摇，疲惫部队的留下明显的机会并为我们的敌人所利用。我们被迅速压制，而我们的敌人是无可争议的胜利者。

original: Our troops are surrounded in the blink of an eye, and we take more casualties than the opponent. In the aftermath [attacker.GetFirstName] stands as the obvious victor.
translation: 我们的军队转眼间就被包围了，我们付出了比敌人更多的伤亡。在此之后[attacker.GetFirstName]成为显而易见的胜利者。

original: Our attempt to reinforce the center is much too late, and our troops end up disarrayed as we scramble to defend against the united forces of [attacker.GetFirstName]. It is clear that we cannot hold the line, and so we admit defeat.
translation: 我们试图加强中央的努力已经太晚，我们拼凑的军队抵挡[attacker.GetFirstName]的军队时已经阵型混乱。显然我们的军队不能守住阵线，所以我们承认失败。

original: As we were unable to stand up to the cavalry, our opponent had free reign to charge our center. With our forces split up, we were quickly defeated.
translation: 由于我们无法抵御那支骑兵，我们的对手能够自由的朝着我们中军冲锋。随着我们的军队被不断分割，我们被迅速击败。

original: With our troops struggling to keep the flanks reinforced, exhaustion is upon them before the fighting has gotten truly grim. [attacker.GetFirstName] only needs to order a decisive push, and our troops are defeated.
translation: 我们的军队一直挣扎着保持对侧翼的增援，战斗真正到来之前士兵们已经疲惫了。[attacker.GetFirstName]只需要发动一个决定性的攻势，我们的军队就被打败了。

original: Strategy is my game!
translation: 战略就是我的游戏！

original: Good game.
translation: 精彩的比赛。

original: Smash the table and send the army pieces flying!
translation: 砸烂桌子，扔飞棋子！
